document_data.mainbody:
av Rayan Dyrr was a very talented scout of Bregan Daerthe in the early 14 century DR.
In 1313 DR, Nav Rayan Dyrr was the head scout of a Bregan Daerthe mission to Ched Nasad headed by Beniago and Zaknafein DoUrden. They were to follow a House Hunzrin expedition.
In 1329 DR Nav was secretly among the members of the expedition led by Dinin DoUrden against the surface elves and witnessed Drizzt DoUrden killed a child immediately reported the news to Jarlaxle.
